Package br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.cades

Class AbstractCadesSigner

java.lang.Object
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.signer.signatureSwitch.SignatureDataWrapperGenerator
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.cades.AbstractCadesSigner
Direct Known Subclasses:
CadesCoSigner, CadesCounterSigner, CadesSigner
public abstract class AbstractCadesSigner
extends SignatureDataWrapperGenerator
Esta classe trata as partes em comum entre assinaturas CAdES e carimbos do tempo.
